title: Consumed
imgSmText: An exploration of the global overconsumption of food and its impacts.
imgText: This film examines the environmental, economic, and health consequences of modern food overproduction and waste, from factory farms to landfills, questioning our consumption habits.

title: The Cracks Beneath
imgSmText: A harrowing account of the devastating 2023 earthquake in Turkey.
imgText: Through firsthand accounts and footage, this documentary chronicles the tragic 2023 earthquakes in Turkey and Syria, the massive rescue efforts, and the struggle for survival.

title: Life Behind the Wall
imgSmText: A look at daily life and resilience within the occupied Palestinian territories.
imgText: This documentary provides a ground-level view of life in the West Bank and Gaza, exploring themes of resilience, family, and the pursuit of normalcy under occupation.

title: The Deep Blue
imgSmText: A mesmerizing journey into the lives of the ocean's most elusive creatures.
imgText: Utilizing cutting-edge technology, this film reveals the mysterious and alien world of the deep ocean, showcasing species and behaviors never before captured on camera.

title: Tikal: Lost City of Gods
imgSmText: Uncovering the secrets of the ancient Maya temples in the Guatemalan jungle.
imgText: Archaeologists and historians explore the rise and fall of the Maya civilization through the awe-inspiring ruins of Tikal, deciphering its advanced astronomy and architecture.

title: The Scribe's Code
imgSmText: Linguists decode the stories told by ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs.
imgText: This documentary follows a team of linguists and Egyptologists as they work to fully translate the hieroglyphic language, revealing new insights into Pharaohs' lives and beliefs.

title: Digital Dilemma
imgSmText: Investigating AI's potential impact on child development and learning.
imgText: Experts in neuroscience and education examine how generative AI and algorithmic content could be reshaping children's brains, attention spans, and critical thinking skills.

title: The True Cost
imgSmText: Exposing the human and environmental cost of fast fashion in Bangladesh.
imgText: This film reveals the brutal working conditions, poverty wages, and environmental devastation behind the global fast fashion industry, focusing on the factories of Bangladesh.

title: Fired & Formed
imgSmText: The art and science of hand-blown glassmaking in a modern factory.
imgText: A mesmerizing look into the ancient craft of glassmaking, from the intense heat of the furnace to the delicate artistry required to create beautiful and functional pieces.

title: Stolen Childhood
imgSmText: The brutal reality of child mining slaves in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
imgText: This harrowing documentary exposes the use of child slaves in cobalt and coltan mines, minerals essential for smartphones and electric cars, and the supply chain that enables it.

title: The Silicon Savannah
imgSmText: How Africa's tech hubs are driving innovation and economic growth.
imgText: From Kenya's mobile money revolution to Nigeria's fintech boom, this film explores the rapid rise of Africa's tech industry and its young entrepreneurs shaping the continent's future.

title: The Shadow Economy
imgSmText: An undercover investigation into Europe's sprawling black markets.
imgText: Journalists go undercover to explore the multi-billion euro black markets for counterfeit goods, stolen data, and wildlife trafficking operating within the European Union.

title: Winged Migration
imgSmText: The astounding journey of birds across continents and hemispheres.
imgText: Using revolutionary filming techniques, this documentary captures the epic, perilous migrations of birds across thousands of miles, from the Arctic to the Antarctic.

title: The Invisible War
imgSmText: The secret history of spies and intelligence during the Cold War.
imgText: Through declassified files and interviews with former agents, this series reveals the clandestine battles, betrayals, and technological espionage that defined the Cold War era.

title: Earth's Moving Skin
imgSmText: How the movement of tectonic plates shapes our planet.
imgText: Geologists explain the powerful forces of plate tectonics that create mountains, trigger earthquakes, and cause volcanic eruptions, constantly reshaping the face of our planet.

title: Trial & Error
imgSmText: An inside look at the high-stakes world of pharmaceutical clinical trials.
imgText: This documentary follows the years-long process of developing a new cancer drug, from the first lab tests to human trials, exploring the ethics, risks, and hopes of patients.

title: The Memory Project
imgSmText: Holocaust survivors share their testimonies for future generations.
imgText: In a race against time, survivors of the Holocaust recount their horrific experiences in immense detail, ensuring their stories are preserved long after they are gone.

title: The Bee's Needs
imgSmText: The critical role of bees and the dire threat of colony collapse.
imgText: This documentary explores the fascinating world of bees, their crucial role in global food pollination, and the environmental threats that are causing their populations to collapse.

title: Paris 2024: The Games
imgSmText: A behind-the-scenes look at the 2024 Paris Summer Olympics.
imgText: This film follows the journey of several athletes from different nations as they prepare for and compete in the iconic games, capturing the human drama behind the sport.

title: The Unidentified
imgSmText: A scientific investigation into the most credible UFO sightings.
imgText: Experts and military personnel analyze decades of UFO evidence, from the Pentagon's UAP reports to civilian encounters, asking what these objects could be.

title: Sole of the World
imgSmText: The global journey of a shoe, from raw material to consumer.
imgText: This documentary traces the supply chain of the modern shoe, contrasting mass production in large factories with the artistry of bespoke shoemakers.

title: The White Stallions
imgSmText: The history and training of Austria's legendary Lipizzaner horses.
imgText: This film explores the 400-year-old tradition of the Spanish Riding School in Vienna, following the rigorous training of riders and their majestic white horses.

title: King: A Life's Work
imgSmText: The life and legacy of civil rights leader Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.
imgText: Through archival footage and interviews, this documentary chronicles Dr. King's journey from preacher to iconic leader of the American Civil Rights Movement.

title: Secrets in Stone
imgSmText: Deciphering the hidden messages of ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs.
imgText: Follow a team of linguists as they use new technologies to translate previously unreadable hieroglyphs, revealing lost chapters of pharaonic history.

title: Vertical Limit
imgSmText: The world of elite rock climbers tackling Utah's toughest routes.
imgText: This documentary follows professional climbers as they attempt first ascents on the daunting sandstone walls of Moab, capturing their physical and mental struggle.

title: The Burning Canopy
imgSmText: The devastating impact of deforestation on the Amazon rainforest.
imgText: An urgent look at the forces driving deforestation in the Amazon and the indigenous communities and activists fighting to protect their ancestral home.

title: Silent Forests
imgSmText: How invasive snakes are decimating Guam's native bird population.
imgText: This film documents the ecological catastrophe caused by the invasive brown tree snake on Guam, which has wiped out most of the island's native forest birds.

title: Jane's Legacy
imgSmText: The life and ongoing work of primatologist Dr. Jane Goodall.
imgText: Celebrating the remarkable life of Dr. Jane Goodall, from her early groundbreaking research with chimpanzees to her current global advocacy for conservation and hope.

title: The Plastic Tide
imgSmText: The journey of plastic waste from consumption to ocean gyres.
imgText: This documentary traces the path of plastic pollution, exposing the global recycling myth and its devastating impact on marine ecosystems and human health.

title: The Quantum Race
imgSmText: The global competition to build the first practical quantum computer.
imgText: This film explores the high-stakes race between nations and tech giants to achieve quantum supremacy and the potential world-changing implications of this new technology.
